title: Ida Panahandeh Interview Stockholm International Film Festival 2015

sources.title: Ida Panahandeh Interview Stockholm International Film Festival 2015
sources.description: Synopsis Nahid, a young divorcee, lives alone with her 10 year old son in a small city on the Caspian Sea. According to Iranian tradition, custody reverts to the father but the latter agreed to transfer her to his ex-wife, provided she does not remarryâ€¦ Directed by Ida Panahandeh Iran, 2015 Drama 104min
